header.1: True Positive: The right clothes showing up when you search.
header.2: False Negative: The right clothes don't show up when they should.
header.3: False Positive: Clothes that you didn't want show up in your search.
header.4: True Negative: Clothes that you didn't want don't show up, which is good.
header.5: Our priority : minimize number of False negative  (hence the use of the recall metric)
header.6: the goal is to have recall >0.7 and precision >0.7

test_results.query: shoes that are white and black and (another color)
something made of cotton and polyester only
a garment with a cute drawing on it
an item with the christian cross on it
a shirt with a red thing on the back
something similar to Arsene wenger's coat
